rows.label: tev041901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lebora about the Cavern Clan.

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0001
rows.name:
I thought all Cavern Clan were monsters. Murderers.
No better than beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0003
rows.name:
She cares for her men.
Even more than some in Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0004
rows.name:
I wish I could fight her again for joy of it.
No rancor. No rage. Just thrill of battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0009
rows.name: I come here every day. I talk to Slovity and others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Never have I spoken with Cavern Clan who was
not my prisoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0011
rows.name:
I thought them deranged.
Thought they cared only for killing and hate.
But truth is different...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0012
rows.name:
Like other day? I went to see Slovity.
Saw her gnawing giant piece of meat.
Then she suddenly fell asleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041901_MSG0013
rows.name:
I have done this myself. Many times.
Perhaps Prone are Prone at end of day.[ST:wait ]
